lead_paragraph: In the New York region and around the country, many workers and business owners chose to not work as part of a protest of the Trump administration’s policies toward immigrants.

byline.original: By LIZ ROBBINS and ANNIE CORREAL

headline.main: On a ‘Day Without Immigrants,’ Workers Show Their Presence by Staying Home
headline.print_headline: Immigrants Stay Home, and Their Absence Reverberates

snippet: In the New York region and around the country, many workers and business owners chose to not work as part of a protest of the Trump administration’s policies toward immigrants....
